title: Combating glorification of Nazism, neo-Nazism and other practices that contribute to fuelling contemporary forms of racism, racial discrimination, xenophobia and related intolerance
text:
United Nations 
A/C.3/80/L.56
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
7 November 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-17997 (E)    121125     
*2517997* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Third Committee 
Agenda item 69 (a) 
Elimination of racism, racial discrimination, xenophobia 
and related intolerance: elimination of racism, racial 
discrimination, xenophobia and related intolerance  
 
 
 
Albania, Australia, Japan, Liechtenstein, Marshall Islands, New Zealand, 
Norway and Ukraine: amendment to draft resolution A/C.3/80/L.2 
 
 
Combating glorification of Nazism, neo-Nazism and other 
practices that contribute to fuelling contemporary forms of 
racism, racial discrimination, xenophobia and related intolerance 
 
 
After operative paragraph 3, insert a new operative paragraph, reading: 
 
Notes with alarm that the Russian Federation has sought to justify its territorial 
aggression against Ukraine on the purported basis of eliminating neo-Nazism, and 
underlines that the pretextual use of neo-Nazism to justify territorial aggression 
seriously undermines genuine attempts to combat neo-Nazism;
